agenda.description: HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES NOTICE OF PUBLIC HEARING COMMITTEE: State Affairs TIME & DATE: 8:00 AM, Wednesday, May 8, 2019 PLACE: E2.014 CHAIR: Rep. Dade Phelan SB 59 Zaffirini Relating to certain images captured by an unmanned aircraft. SB 65 Nelson | et al. Relating to oversight of and requirements applicable to state agency contracting and procurement. SB 237 Nelson Relating to the criteria for review by the Sunset Advisory Commission of an agency that licenses an occupation. SB 548 Birdwell | et al. Relating to complaints filed with and certain other filings submitted to the Texas Ethics Commission. SB 702 Bettencourt | et al. Relating to the authorization and reporting of expenditures for lobbying activities by certain political subdivisions and other public entities. SB 1577 Alvarado | et al. Relating to a prohibition against the appropriation of money to settle or pay a sexual harassment claim made against certain members of the executive, legislative, or judicial branch of state government. SB 1941 Hancock Relating to use of electric energy storage facilities in the ERCOT power region. SB 2206 Kolkhorst Relating to the availability of certain information regarding the members of the governing body of an independent school district or a public junior college district on the district's Internet website. SB 2232 Hancock Relating to a study of the elimination of the effects of federal renewable energy subsidies. ***ALL TESTIMONY WILL BE LIMITED TO 3 MINUTES*** NOTICE OF ASSISTANCE AT PUBLIC MEETINGS Persons with disabilities who plan to attend this meeting and who may need assistance, such as a sign language interpreter, are requested to contact Stacey Nicchio at (512) 463-0850, 72 hours prior to the meeting so that appropriate arrangements can be made.
